title: The Children of Shiny Mountain
description: From his own highly technical planet, Mash traveled to a distant planet where he discovered a mysterious race of people. Intrigued by their primitive customs, Mash came to love this strange new world -- and soon learned of its remarkable secret: an ancient mountain filled with man-made wonders . . .a fabulous cache that held the key to the planet's future. .
author: David Dvorkin
